product_name: Granite Gear Ultralight Pack Hipbelt - Women's
long_description: The Granite Gear Ultralight pack hipbelt works with the women's Nimbus Core and Trace 62, Leopard A.C. 58 Ki and Blaze A.C. 60 Ki packs, providing light comfort when carrying loads of 35 lbs. or less. Hipbelt features a single pivot-point connection, hip stabilizers, dual-density foam and stretch-woven fabric. Note: the Granite Gear Ultralight pack hipbelt is not compatible with the Leopard V.C. 46 Ki pack.
short_description: The Granite Gear Ultralight pack hipbelt works with the women's Nimbus Core and Trace 62, Leopard A.C. 58 Ki and Blaze A.C. 60 Ki packs, providing light comfort when carrying loads of 35 lbs. or less.
